about_the_game:
You wake up in a basement room, bound, with a camera staring you down. A deranged masked man entices his audience. You’ve been abducted by a lunatic who thrives on chaos and carnage. His goal? To force you into a twisted game of luck while the entire internet watches in real time.

Every decision you make is broadcast live to a bloodthirsty audience. The stakes could not be higher: each failure brings you closer to a gruesome demise, and the viewers seem eager to see you fail. Can you make it out alive?

Will you be able to outsmart this madness, or will you become just another victim of the Death Stream?

Features:

  • Intense puzzles and challenges.

  • A nerve-wracking atmosphere.

  • Multiple endings based on your decisions and performance.

  • Leaderboard.

content_descriptors.notes: Death Stream is a  game that contains  scenes of violence, blood, and psychological torment. Players will encounter themes of abduction, torture, and life-or-death situations, all presented in a tense and unsettling atmosphere.

Will you be able to outsmart this madness, or will you become just another victim of the Death Stream?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Relatively modern dedicated graphics card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Relatively modern dedicated graphics card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

You’ve been abducted by a lunatic who thrives on chaos and carnage. His goal? To force you into a twisted game of luck while the entire internet watches in real time.
